sentences.en: Class size varies from one type of institution to another.
sentences.cn: 班级大小因院校类型而异。

sentences.en: Do you have these pants in a size 12?
sentences.cn: 这裤子有 12 号的吗？

sentences.en: Each brick also varies slightly in tone, texture and size.
sentences.cn: 每块砖在色调、质地与大小上也都略有不同。

sentences.en: Each recipe specifies the size of egg to be used.
sentences.cn: 每种菜谱都具体规定了所用鸡蛋的大小。

sentences.en: He suggested a link between class size and test results of seven-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 他认为7岁大的学生的测试分数和班级的规模有关系。

sentences.en: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.cn: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.en: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.
sentences.cn: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。

sentences.en: I faxed 10 hotels in the area to check room size.
sentences.cn: 我给该地区10家旅馆发了传真，核实房间大小。

sentences.en: I would class my garden as medium in size.
sentences.cn: 我的花园只能算是中等大小。

sentences.en: If it can be done full-size, I can do it in miniature.
sentences.cn: 如果可以做成与原物相同大小的，我就可以做成缩微的。

sentences.en: In 1970 the average size of a French farm was 19 hectares.
sentences.cn: 1970年，法国农场的平均规模为19公顷。

sentences.en: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.
sentences.cn: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。

sentences.en: My sister is the same height but only a size 12.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐是一样的身高，不过只穿12号的。

sentences.en: Republics will have voting rights propor-tionate to the size of their economies.
sentences.cn: 各共和国将拥有与其经济规模成比例的选举权。

sentences.en: She sized up her opponent.
sentences.cn: 她评估她的对手

sentences.en: Shrimp are sized and selected for canning.
sentences.cn: 虾按大小分类制成罐头。

sentences.en: The new planet is about ten times the size of the earth.
sentences.cn: 新发现的行星大约是地球的10倍那么大。

sentences.en: The once-powerful post unions have been cut down to size.
sentences.cn: 一度很强势的邮政联盟已经威风不再。

sentences.en: The piece was reduced in size by planing down the four corners.
sentences.cn: 这块木头的4个角刨过后就变小了。

sentences.en: the PVC sheet is easily &B{cut to size}.
sentences.cn: PVC板很容易按所需的尺寸切割。

sentences.en: The shirts come in three sizes: small, medium, and large.
sentences.cn: 这些衬衣有三个尺码: 小号、中号和大号。

sentences.en: The size of the fish will determine the thickness of the steaks.
sentences.cn: 鱼的大小决定鱼排的厚度。

sentences.en: These shoes are one size too big.
sentences.cn: 这双鞋子大了一码。

sentences.en: Use your mouse to drag the pictures to their new size.
sentences.cn: 用鼠标拖动图片，将其调整为新的尺寸。

words.tran_cn: 相比（size的过去分词）；按大小分类

phrases.tran_cn: （两个或多个人或物）同样大小的
人口规模；人口数量；群体大小
孔径；孔隙大小；气孔尺寸
粒度分布；粒径分布；大小分布；径谱
尺寸效应；规模效果；晶粒尺寸效应
估计：做出一种估计、看法或判断

phrases.phrase: that's about the size of it
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（尤指确认某人对某个被认为不好的情况所做的评价）大概是这样

trans.tran_cn: 大小，尺寸，规模，胶料，浆糊，巨大，大量，尺码
trans.tran_en: how big or small something is
how big or small something is

trans.tran_cn: 按大小排列，改变…的大小，上胶料，上浆，上涂料
